org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor

Class AWTDrawVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor.AbstractAWTDrawVisitor
      • org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor.AWTDrawVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRenderingVisitor, IDrawVisitor

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor.AWTDrawVisitorTest")
public class AWTDrawVisitor
extends AbstractAWTDrawVisitor
    Implementation of the IDrawVisitor interface for the AWT widget toolkit, allowing molecules to be rendered with toolkits based on AWT, like the Java reference graphics platform Swing.
    Belongs to CDK module:
    renderawt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AWTDrawVisitor(Graphics2D graphics)
      Constructs a new IDrawVisitor using the AWT widget toolkit, taking a Graphics2D object to which the chemical content is drawn.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFontManager(IFontManager fontManager)
      The font manager must be set by any renderer that uses this class! This manager is needed to keep track of fonts of the right size.
      void setRendererModel(RendererModel rendererModel)
      Sets the RendererModel this IDrawVisitor should use.
      void visit(IRenderingElement element)
      Translates a IRenderingElement into a widget toolkit specific rendering element.

      • Methods inherited from class org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor.AbstractAWTDrawVisitor

        setTransform, transformPoint

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • visit

        @TestMethod(value="testVisit")
public void visit(IRenderingElement element)
        Translates a IRenderingElement into a widget toolkit specific rendering element.
        Parameters:

      • setFontManager

        @TestMethod(value="testSetFontManager")
public void setFontManager(IFontManager fontManager)
        The font manager must be set by any renderer that uses this class! This manager is needed to keep track of fonts of the right size.
        Parameters:
        fontManager - the IFontManager to be used
